attributes.action: do all in his power to prevent Tony Blair becoming President of the European Union
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tony Blair's disastrous policy which lead the United Kingdome to invade Iraq in 2003, a policy now regarded as wrong by a majority of the Britiah people, and stated to be "against the rule of law" by Lord Bingham, a former Lord Chief Justice, has diminished the stature of the United Kingdom in the eyes of the World. It also increased significantly the risk of terrorist attacks against the British people here in the United Kingdom and abroad.
If Tony Blair were to be elected President of the EU it further reduce the world standing of the EU and the UK.
